head.title: SyncPlay
head.description: A tool to sync play a video with your friends.
head.author: Waterice Tang

sync_play.index: Input [s/server] to start a new server, [c/client] to start a client. [q/quit/..] to quit. [h/help] to show the help document.
sync_play.help:
This is a help document for sync_play. You can use this tool to sync play a video with your friends. You can start a server or a client. The server will send the video to the client and the client will play the video. You can use the following commands: 
[s/server]	to start a new server
[c/client]	to start a client
[q/quit/..]	to quit
[h/help]	to show the help document.

server.index:
Successfully started a server. You can use the browser to start a media freely. 
 Following media supply are supported:
Bilibili
Mutefun
Kugou Music

Input [h/help] for more information. 
Waiting for clients to connect...
server.help:
This is a help document for server. You can use this tool to start a server to sync play a video with your friends. You can use the following commands: 
[h/help]	to show the help document.
[q/quit/..]	to stop the server and back to the main menu.
[p/podcast]	to podcast to all connected clients.

client.index:
Successfully started a client. You can use the browser to play the video. 
 Following media supply are supported:
Bilibili
Mutefun
Kugou Music

Input [h/help] for more information. 
Waiting for the server to send the media...
client.help:
This is a help document for client. You can use this tool to start a client to sync play a video with your friends. You can use the following commands: 
[h/help]	to show the help document.
[q/quit/..]	to stop the client and back to the main menu.
[s/sync]	to sync the state from the server.
